byline.contributor: Andrew Keh and Joshua Brustein contributed reporting.

abstract: Miscommunication between St Louis Cardinals dugout and bullpen in Game 5 of the World Series against Texas Rangers has put a new spotlight on baseball's reliance on landlines to call the bullpen.
snippet: Monday night’s bullpen debacle by the Cardinals has put a new spotlight on baseball’s reliance on landlines.
lead_paragraph: Monday night’s bullpen debacle by the Cardinals has put a new spotlight on baseball’s reliance on landlines.

headline.print_headline: Missed Bullpen Calls Lead to an Interesting Game of Telephone
